section.title: EVMClusterList
section.para: EVMClusterList retrieves all of the id and name values of the Cluster instances stored in the VMDB.

listitem.para: Output: VMdbWs..ClusterListArray. Each VmdbwsSupport..ClusterList object contains the guid and name of a host.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMClusterList usage:

example.title: EVMClusterList WSDL
example.programlisting:
<message name="EVMClusterList"> </message> <message name="EVMClusterListResponse"> <part name="return" type="typens:VmdbwsSupport..ClusterListArray"/> </message>
<xsd:complexType name="VmdbwsSupport..ClusterList"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>

example.title: EVMClusterList Output (PowerShell)
example.screen:
Clusters:
id : 1 name : Testing-Production Cluster
id : 2 name : Development-Production Cluster
Resource Pools:
id name -- ---- 10 Citrix 9 MiqCloud 8 Production Test environment 7 Testing 6 Training 5 VMware View VMs 1 Default
